data.title: Lydia Shum
data.meta_description: Lydia Shum (); Hong Konger; Lydia Shum's ex-husband is actor Adam Cheng, and their daughter is singer/actress Joyce Cheng.Lydia Shum entered the Hong Kong entertainment
